radiographic_examinations.findings: gallstone, without evidence of thickening of the gallbladder wall, and a cyst in the left kidney
bilateral cysts and a hyperechoic stone on the left side, without evidence of hydronephrosis

thickening of both mitral leaflets, calcification of the posterior mitral annulus, left atrial dilatation, thickened aortic leaflets, symmetrical left ventricular hypertrophy, and segmental left ventricular dysfunction

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: computed tomographic (CT) examination of the thorax
radiographic_examinations.findings: multiple, calcified left-sided hilar and subcarinal lymph nodes; the lungs appeared normal

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis

radiographic_examinations.findings: small foci of increased uptake in the cervical spine, right foot, and right knee; consistent with degenerative changes; no evidence of osteomyelitis
